Class EditColumnCharacteristicsView

java.lang.Object
main.AbstractView
main.EditColumnCharacteristicsView
public class EditColumnCharacteristicsView extends AbstractView
Represents a view for editing the characteristics of a column.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EditColumnCharacteristicsView(TablrManager mgr, LayoutInfo layoutInfo, ViewList viewList, DesignView underlyingMode, String name, UUID tableId)
    Constructs a view for editing the characteristics of a column.

  • Constructor Details

    • EditColumnCharacteristicsView

      public EditColumnCharacteristicsView(TablrManager mgr, LayoutInfo layoutInfo, ViewList viewList, DesignView underlyingMode, String name, UUID tableId)
      Constructs a view for editing the characteristics of a column.
      Parameters:
      mgr - the TablrManager instance responsible for managing the application's data and views
      underlyingMode - the underlying DesignView providing the base visual representation and functionality
      name - the initial name of the column being edited
      tableId - the UUID of the table containing the column

    • handleEscape

      public void handleEscape()
      Handles the escape key event within the view. Reverts the column name being edited to its original name and switches the mode back to the underlying view.
      Specified by:
      handleEscape in class AbstractView

    • handleBackSpace

      Handles the backspace key event within the view to update the column name being edited.

    • handleCharTyped

      public void handleCharTyped(char keyChar)
